name: CRAFT 2020
additionalNotes: CRAFT 2020 is a 5 3/4 x 46 corona gorda that uses a variety of different varietals and designs for the wrapper. Those wrapper combinations include Connecticut broadleaf and Ecuadorian Connecticut wrappers with Mexican San Andr√©s accents. Others use American broadleaf and Ecuadorian habano wrappers with Ecuadorian Connecticut accents. RoMa Craft Tobac is not disclosing the internal blend.
